title: Rank boarder taken away
body: So I've been gold for the past 2 seasons(solo queue) and after patch 9.1 the client is claiming that I was Silver 4 last season (season 8). I had the gold border for a while this season and since the patch it has reverted to a silver boarder.

replies.body:
So different parts of the client seem to be pulling different information from different places.

https://i.imgur.com/oVfAdPp.png[]

The border it's actually showing on your profile (Gold) is accurate, but the one it says is your previous rank on hover and is showing in loading (Silver) is pulling from your flex rank only instead of your highest rank.

This is true for both of you.

https://i.imgur.com/jrcFfQL.png[]

~~Looking at some other people's profiles this isn't a universal issue though, so I'm unsure what makes it affect you guys specifically. I can only assume that it's an issue related to the upcoming reset or to do with people who got bumped up from Div 5 to Div 4.~~

~~Player support might be able to provide you with more information: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new~~

~~I wouldn't be too worried unless S9 rolls around and it's still displaying incorrectly.~~

UPDATE: Seems to be affecting anyone who got bumped up from Div 4 to 5 (with that increased rank being their highest) and confirmed started this patch. I've passed it on and we did some digging to confirm conditions so hopefully we'll hear something/it'll be fixed up soon.
I have the same problem too, recently I've had the plat border but now it is showing my flex border which is silver when loading into a game

You're not alone, I finished last season in Gold V and with the new patch I have no border at all. A few people are experiencing the same problem.

{{summoner:3}}
